title: Soviet Submachine Guns of World War II: PPD-40, PPSh-41 and PPS

Soviet Submachine Guns of World War II: PPD-40, PPSh-41 and PPS (Osprey Weapon 33)
by Chris McNab

DESCRIPTION:

With numerous first-hand combat accounts, and detailed technical explanations, this book is ideal for both the general reader and the firearms enthusiast.
